data.title: Summer of '42 — Glenview Public Library
data.meta_description: Summer of '42 — Three teenage friends convey the hilarity of their awkward sexual quest and the genuine pain of growing up. Hermie is finally united with an "older woman" of 22.
data.text:
Three teenage friends convey the hilarity of their awkward sexual quest and the genuine pain of growing up. Hermie is finally united with an "older woman" of 22.

There are no comments from the community on this title
